hadith.chapterTitle: Merit of Suhur (Predawn meal in Ramadan) and the Excellence of Delaying having it till before Dawn
hadith.body:
Zaid bin Thabit (May Allah be pleased with him) reported: We took Suhur (predawn meal) with the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) and then we stood up for (Fajr) Salat (prayer). It was asked: "How long was the gap between the two?" He replied: "The time required for the recitation of fifty Ayat."

[Al-Bukhari and Muslim].

hadith.chapterTitle: - باب فضل السحور وتأخيره ما لم يخشَ طلوع الفجر‏:
hadith.body: - وعن زيد بن ثابت رضي الله عنه قال‏:‏ تسحرنا مع رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم ثم قمنا إلى الصلاة قيل كم كان بينهما‏؟‏ قال‏:‏ خمسون آية ‏(‏‏(‏متفق عليه‏)‏‏)‏
